game.name: Galactic Diner
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Galactic Diner is a cooking-themed RPG full of minigame mayhem. Explore a planet full of friends, food, and mysteries, and cook your way to the top of the galaxy!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Galactic Diner is a cooking-themed RPG full of minigame mayhem. Explore a planet full of friends, food, and mysteries, and cook your way to the top of the galaxy!
